div.head: 疼冷
div.div: cold pain to be painful and cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: cold pain to be painful and cold

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with leng tong 冷痛 , cold and pain. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry ce zi 側子：主 癰腫，風痹歷節，腰脚疼冷 , “It controls obstruction-illness swelling, wind blockage with penetration of joints, cold pain in the lower back and legs”.
